North Queensland won't have any shortage of motivation to improve after they conceded 34 first-half points in last week's loss to the Wests Tigers.

articles.title: First Goal Ever: The opening goal in Gold Coast history | 2011 | AFL - AFL
articles.description: Charlie Dixon kicks the first goal for Gold Coast in its inaugural game against Carlton in Round 2, 2011. Subscribe now and get more footy in your feed. Foll...
